page.title: 14Our Homes and Families.
page.content: Elizabeth lives in a{semi-detatched three bedroomed house in Woolston. There is a sitting-room,a dining-room a kitchen and a bathroom. She lives there with her father, mother,two brothers and one sister.Her two oldest brothers are married and each lives in a flat with his wife and baby son. Sarah lives in Shirley with her father, mother and four year old brother, Thomas.Their house is about fifty years old and is{semi-detatched. An extension gives it three bedrooms,a bathroom,lounge,dining-room and kitchen.They grow vegetables in the garden. Karen lives on the Weston{Council {Estate}with her parents and eight year old sister,Kathleen.Their house has a bathroom two bedrooms a lounge,dining room and a kitchen.
